reviews.review: Es Un Juego entretenido Y Muy Divertido, Te Tilteas Un Poco Pero Te cagas De Risa, Lo recomiendo. xd

I'll just give you pros and cons because that's all you need

PROS:
Voice chat is adjustable it is possible even though some say its not
Its a life lesson that if you choose the wrong path, look what you get into.
Sure there's blood, but nothing visual, it can be adjusted as well.
there's no p-2-w which is pretty awesome

CONS:
Graphics might be a bit bad if your playing on a potato if you know what I mean.
If you do choose voice chat, its a bit toxic.
This is about any game but you do have an option to spend money
